reviews.review_msg: Absolutely worst professor I ever had. Not only does he gaslight his students, he is unclear about class work material. Furthermore, he is rude and dismissive to questions students may have. I would not take his class unless you want to get bullied by your professor.
Huai is the best. Period. He does not only teach you the course; he also teaches you the philosophy of life and how to be a kind and wise person.
Huai is fun, knowledgeable, and patient, the best teacher I've ever had! Truly enjoyed the semester.
